name: HaloPSA
natural_language_description: 这是 HaloPSA 节点。主要用于: Consume HaloPSA API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: client | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users

clientName.name: clientName
clientName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Enter client name | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: password (值: None) - Your new password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one letter, one number or symbol, one upper case character and one lower case character

clientId.name: clientId
clientId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
clientId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Client Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: search (值: None) - Filter users by your search string

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: password (值: None) - Your new password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one letter, one number or symbol, one upper case character and one lower case character
site_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

ticketType.name: ticketType
ticketType.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
ticketType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

siteName.name: siteName
siteName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Enter site name | (必填项)

selectOption.name: selectOption
selectOption.description: Whether client can be selected by ID
selectOption.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select Client by ID | 作用: Whether client can be selected by ID | 默认值: False

siteId.name: siteId
siteId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
siteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Site Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

userName.name: userName
userName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Enter user name | (必填项)
